front.note:
Reviewed by: Fernando Figueroa,Ph.D.
Technology Development and Transfer Engineering Division
front.div:
Abstract
Improve signal anomaly detection for ISHM system, in which the system is self-monitoring. In
particular improve detection of spikes and noisy regions of signals. Researched statistical analysis of
measurements using kurtosis and skewness in order to develop algorithms to detect noise and spikes.
Also researched spectral analysis of signals, as well as statistical analysis of the spectral data in order to
develop algorithms. Two spike detection algorithms were created analyzing the spectral data, as well as
one noise detection algorithm. Skewness of measurements was useful in removing false positives from
detection for noise.
